show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Invisible All Over Again
content:
Millions of Americans seem to have disappeared. Gone without a trace, without notice. <!--more--> Surely such a thing would merit media coverage.
Surely our commander in chief would make an effort to find them.
Well, no.
And no.
Leid Stories explains why the legacy-building, second-term president maintains his political distance with the teeming masses, selling a narrative his America wants to hear, and why the so-called “liberal” media have taken to their old narrative-without-context ways.
Quick!
Dust off your copies of Ralph Ellison’s Invisible Man!
